ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 3
ygData.msgSnippet: Where you planning on going after Cazic?  Where is a place tankers are needed?  I see the people fighting the Sand Giants but I don t suspect that tankers are
ygData.messageBody:
Where you planning on going after Cazic? Where is a place tankers are
needed? I see the people fighting the Sand Giants but I don't suspect that
tankers are needed. Most of the people fighting it keep the sand giant
non-mobile or have pets that keep the thing busy while they wail on it with
magic.

What is good place for us tankers to go 30+? I personally am a troll shadow
knight, but play it mostly like a Warrior =P. With my halberd, blackened
iron crown, blackened iron breastplate and banded I make a great tank.
Hopefully getting store plate soon . . . but anyway... Since you are
bragging about your lvl (jk) =). Where is a good place that tanks are
needed to lvl up

-16 Shadow Knight
Kazruk da Ugli
